bioconda.name: bioconductor-cghnormaliter
bioconda.summary: Normalization of array CGH data with imbalanced aberrations.

biotools.summary: Normalization and centralization of array comparative genomic hybridization (aCGH) data. The algorithm uses an iterative procedure that effectively eliminates the influence of imbalanced copy numbers. This leads to a more reliable assessment of copy number alterations (CNAs).

bioschemas.name: CGHnormaliter
bioschemas.summary: Normalization and centralization of array comparative genomic hybridization (aCGH) data. The algorithm uses an iterative procedure that effectively eliminates the influence of imbalanced copy numbers. This leads to a more reliable assessment of copy number alterations (CNAs).
